text: (napiye!) Nam ella makkalaiyum avaravarkalutaiya talaivarkalutan alaikkum nalai (nir ninaivuttuviraka annalil) evarutaiya (ceyal kurippu) etu avarutaiya valakkaiyil kotukkappatukirato, a(ttakai narperutaiya)varkal tam etukalai (nim'matiyutan) patipparkal; innum, avarkan anuvalavum aniyayam ceyyappata mattarkal
